Text: Preorder your ShrekTM gift set and purchase last minute Halloween giftscgibinfcollectionplHHEADFLO cgibinfcollectionplHHEADFLO cgibinfproductplHFLO Bear in a Pumpkin Sweaterwith Candy Corn cgibinfproductplHFLO Dear Shelley Halloween is only two days away If you think you dont have a ghost of a chance to still find Halloween gifts then take a look at our Halloween Collection cgibinfcollectionplHBODFLO We have bears dressed in costumes sweets gourmet goodies decorations for the home and Halloween arrangements for your favorite ghosts and goblins Dont scream You can still be the hit of Halloween And with holiday shopping on the horizon look no further for this years hottest gift You can preorder the blockbuster hit movie Shrek on DVD or VHS and avoid getting shut out when it starts flying off the shelves It comes with a cuddly plush buddy of your choice either Shrek or his faithful sidekick Donkey Preorder the Shrek Movie and Plush Gift Set cgibinfproductplHBODFLO today and schedule delivery beginning November From your friends at FLOWERSCOM Call FLOWERS Click wwwflowerscom or Come in AOL Keyword flowers Offer valid through Shrek TM c DreamWorks LLC All Rights Reserved This email was sent to NRONCOM Bear in a Devil Suit with Red Hots cgibinfproductplHFLO cgibinfproductplHFLO cgibinfproductplHFLO cgibinfproductplHFLO Bear in a Devil Suitwith Red Hots cgibinfproductplHFLO Shrek Movieand Plush Gift Set cgibinfproductplHFLO Frights and Flowers cgibinfproductplHFLO Fields of Europe Fall cgibinfproductplHFLO Register Now flowersmyshopregisterasp Personalized Greetings flowersgreetingsindexasp Gift Certificates flowersjumpgiftcertasp Member Benefits flowersonlinewelcomeasp Gift Finder velocitydefaulthtm Remove Me flowersservicecutoffaspid Contact Us flowersservicecontactasp Security Privacy flowerssecurityindexasp Disclaimer flowersservicecutoffaspid Store Locator flowersstoreslocatorasp emailtypeaspemailidemailtype
